name: tt.fm scrobbler
body:
### Turntable.fm + Last.fm = Love tt.fm scrobbler updates your last.fm records for you when you're chillin out to tunes on turntable.fm. It's a bookmarklet so it should work on Firefox, Chrome, Safari, your toaster, whatever - and it's so easy to use, even grandma can keep an archive of her filthy dubstep tracks!
# Instructions: 1. Drag this link: tt.fm scrobbler to your bookmarks bar 2. Click the bookmarklet everytime you enter a turntable.fm chatroom 3. Follow the last.fm login instructions and... BOOM! scrobbles everywhere ### Author Viet Trang (@vtrang) ### Support or Contact Having trouble? Contact vtrang@student.umass.edu and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
